title: ‘Barry’ Season 3, Episode 2 Recap With Bill Hader
description:
Sean is joined again by the writer, director and star of HBO’s ‘Barry,' Bill Hader, to discuss and recap the second episode of Season 3. Bill and Sean break down some of the filmmaking that has characterized the HBO drama, and how it has developed alongside the show’s characters three seasons into the series.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Bill Hader
Producer: Bobby Wagner
